name: Bluezzle
description:
Made by: Tavr.Bluezzar

When you press the button W, you move forward.

When you press the button S, you move backward.

When you press the button A, your second cube moves to the left.

When you press the button D, you move to the right.

My Discord: Tavr.Bluezzars#3960

You play as a cube who wants to get out of the kingdom and some friends help him!
